Verses: 1 silar Yoodheyaavilirundhu Vandhu: Neengal Moseyinudaiya Muraimaiyinpadiye Viruththasedhanamadaiyaavittaal Ratchikkappadamaatteergal Endru Sagodhararukkup Podhagampanninaargal.

2 adhinaale Avargalukkum Pavul Barnabaa Enbavargalukkum Migundha Vaakkuvaadhamum Tharkkamum Undaanabodhu, Andha Vishayaththinimiththam Pavulum Barnabaavum Avargalaich Serndha Verusilarum Erusalemilirukkira Apposthalaridaththirkum Moopparidaththirkum Pogavendumendru Theermaaniththaargal.

3 andhappadi Avargal Sabaiyaaraal Vazhivittanuppappattu, Penikke Samaariyaa Naadugalin Vazhiyaaip Poi, Purajaadhiyaar Mananthirumbina Seydhiyai Ariviththu, Sagodharar Ellaarukkum Indha Sandhoshaththai Undaakkinaargal.
4 avargal Erusalemukku Vandhu, Sabaiyaaraalum Apposthalaraalum Moopparaalum Etrukkollappattabodhu, Dhevan Thangalaikkondu Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Ariviththaargal.

5 appozhudhu Pariseya Samayaththaaril Visuvaasigalaana Silar Ezhundhu, Avargalai Viruththasedhanampannugiradhum Moseyin Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kaikkollumpadi Avargalukkuk Karpikkiradhum Avasiyam Endraargal.
6 apposthalarum Moopparum Indhak Kaariyaththaik Kuriththu Aalosanaipannumpadi Koodinaargal.

7 migundha Tharkkam Undaanabodhu, Pedhuru Ezhundhu, Avargalai Nokki: Sagodharare Neengal Arindhirukkirapadi Purajaadhiyaar Ennudaiya Vaayinaale Suvisesha Vasanaththaik Kettu Visuvaasikkumpadi Dhevan Anega Naatkalukku Munne Ungalil Oruvanaagiya Ennaith Therindhukondaar.
8 irudhayangalai Arindhirukkira Dhevan Namakkup Parisuththa Aaviyaith Thandharulinadhupola Avargalukkum Thandharuli, Avargalaik Kuriththuch Saatchikoduththaar;
9 visuvaasaththinaale Avargal Irudhayangalai Avar Suththamaakki, Namakkum Avargalukkum Yaadhoru Viththiyaasamumiraadhapadi Seydhaar.
10 ippadiyirukka, Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalaalum Nammaalum Sumakkakkoodaadhirundha Nugaththadiyaich Seeshar Kazhuththinmel Sumaththuvadhinaal, Neengal Dhevanaich Sodhippaanen?
11 karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Kirubaiyile Avargal Ratchikkappadugiradhu Eppadiyo, Appadiye Naamum Ratchikkappaduvomendru Nambiyirukkirome Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Koodivandhirundha Yaavarum Amarndhirundhu, Barnabaavum Pavulum Thangalaikkondu Dhevan Purajaadhigalukkulle Seydha Adaiyaalangal Arpudhangal Yaavaiyum Vivariththuch Sollakkettaargal.
13 avargal Pesi Mudinthapinbu, Yaakkobu Avargalai Nokki: Sagodharare, Enakkuch Sevikodungal.
14 dhevan Purajaadhikalinindru Thamadhu Naamaththirkaaga Oru Janaththaith Therindhukollumpadi Mudhalmudhal Avargalukkuk Kadaatchiththarulina Vidhaththaich Simiyon Vivariththuch Sonnaare.
15 adharkuth Theerkkadharisigaludaiya Vaakkiyangalum Oththirukkiradhu.
16 eppadiyenil, Matra Manusharum, Ennudaiya Naamantharikkappadum Sagala Jaadhigalum, Karththaraith Thedumpadikku,

17 naan Idharkuppinbu Thirumbivandhu, Vizhundhupona Thaaveedhin Koodaaraththai Marupadiyum Eduppiththu, Adhile Pazhudhaaipponavaigalai Marupadiyum Seerppaduththi, Adhaich Sevvaiyaaga Niruththuven Endru Ivaigalaiyellaanj Seygira Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
18 ulagaththotramudhal Dhevanukkuth Thammudaiya Kiriyaigalellaam Therindhirukkiradhu.
19 aadhalaal Purajaadhigalil Dhevanidaththil Thirumbugiravargalaik Kalangappannalaagaadhendrum,

20 vikkirakangalukkup Padaiththa Asusiyaanavaigalukkum, Vesiththanaththirkum, Nerukkundu Seththadhirkum, Raththaththirkum, Vilagiyirukkumpadi Avargalukku Naam Ezhudhavendumendrum Naan Theermaanikkiren.
21 moseyin Aagamangal Oivunaaldhorum Jebaaalayangalil Vaasikkappattu Varugirapadiyaal, Poorvakaalanthodangich Sagala Pattanangalilum Andha Aagamangalaip Pirasangikkiravargalum Unde Endraan.

22 appozhudhu Thangalil Silaraith Therindhukondu Pavulodum Barnabaavodum Andhiyogiyaavukku Anuppugiradhu Apposthalarukkum Moopparukkum Sabaiyaarellaarukkum Nalamaagakkandadhu. Avargal Yaarendraal Sagodhararil Viseshiththavargalaagiya Barsabaa Endru Maruperkonda Yoodhaavum Seelaavume.

23 ivargal Kaiyil Avargal Ezhudhikkoduththanuppina Nirubamaavadhu: Apposthalarum Moopparum Sagodhararumaagiya Naangal Andhiyogiyaavilum Seeriyaavilum Silisiyaavilum Irukkum Purajaadhiyaaraagiya Sagodhararukku Vaazhththudhal Solli Ezhudhiya Nirubam Ennavendraal:

24 engalaal Kattalaiperaadha Silar Engalidaththilirundhu Purappattu, Neengal Viruththasedhanamadaiya Vendumendrum, Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kaikkollavendumendrum Solli, Ippadippatta Vaarththaigalaal Ungalaik Kalakki, Ungal Aaththumaakkalaip Purattinaargal Endru Naangal Kelvippattapadiyinaale,
25 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththirkaagath Thangal Piraananaiyum Oppukkodukkath Thunindhavargalum Engalukkup Piriyamaanavargalumaayirukkira Barnabaa Pavul Enbavargalodunkooda,
26 engalaal Therindhukollappatta Sila Manusharai Ungalidaththirku Anuppugiradhu Orumanappattuk Koodina Engalukku Nalamaagak Kandadhu.
27 andhappadiye Yoodhaavaiyum Seelaavaiyum Anuppiyirukkirom. Avargalum Ivaigalai Vaaimozhiyaaga Ungalukku Arivippaargal.
28 evaiyenil, Vikkiragangalukkuppadaiththavaigalukkum, Raththaththirkum, Nerukkundu Sethdhadhirkum, Vesiththanaththirkum, Neengal Vilagiyirukkavendumenbadhe.

29 avasiyamaana Ivaigalaiyallaamal Baaramaana Verondraiyum Ungalmel Sumaththaamaliruppadhu Parisuththa Aavikkum Engalukkum Nalamaagak Kandadhu; Ivaigalukku Vilagi Neengal Ungalaik Kaaththukkolvadhu Nalamaayirukkum. Sugamaayiruppeergalaaga Endru Ezhudhinaargal.
30 avargal Anuppividappattu, Andhiyogiyaavukku Vandhu, Sabaiyaik Koodivarachseydhu, Nirubaththai Oppuviththaargal.
31 adhai Avargal Vaasiththu, Adhanaalundaagiya Aarudhalukkaagach Sandhoshappattaargal.
32 yoodhaa Seelaa Enbavargalum Theerkkadharisigalaayirundhapadiyinaale Anega Vaarththaigalinaal Sagodhararukkup Buththisolli, Avargalaith Thidappaduththi;
33 silakaalam Angeyirundhu, Pinbu Sagodhararaal Samaadhaanaththode Apposthalaridaththirku Anuppividappattaargal.
34 aagilum Seelaavukku Ange Thariththirukkiradhu Nalamaaik Kandadhu.
35 pavulum Barnabaavum Andhiyogiyaavile Sanjariththu, Vere Anegarodunkoodak Karththarudaiya Vasanaththai Ubadhesiththup Pirasangiththukkondirundhaargal.
36 silanaalaikkuppinbu Pavul Barnabaavai Nokki: Naam Karththarudaiya Vasanaththai Ariviththirukkira Sagala Pattanangalilumulla Sagodharargal Eppadiyirukkiraargalendru Poippaarppom Vaarum Endraan.
37 appozhudhu Barnabaa Enbavan Maarku Ennum Perkonda Yovaanaikkooda Azhaiththukkondu Pogavendum Endraan.
38 pavulo: Avan Pambiliyaa Naattile Nammai Vittup Pirindhu Nammodekooda Oozhiyaththukku Varaadhadhinaale, Avanai Azhaiththukkondu Pogakkoodaadhu Endraan.
39 idhaippatri Avargalukkulle Kadunkobamoondapadiyinaal Avargal Oruvaraiyoruvar Vittup Pirindhaargal. Barnabaa Maarkuvaik Koottikkondu Kappal Erich Seeppurutheevukkup Ponaan.
40 pavulo Seelaavai Therindhukondu, Sagodhararaale Dhevanudaiya Kirubaikku Oppuvikkappattu, Purappattu,
41 seeriyaavilum Silisiyaavilum Thirindhu, Sabaigalaith Thidappaduththinaan.
